ComicInfo.Title: 13 Badges, Part 1; Harsh Conditions
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dredd returns to Mega-City One-still recovering from the ravages of 'The Long Fail'-only to find the Justice Department under siege! Seems that someone has snuffed 12 Judges in creative and shocking ways. Someone who is intimiately familiar the routines of your average street Judge and their sector houses... Someone who Dredd himself failed to catch just a few months ago!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Brendan McCarthy | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Andrew Currie (a) & Stephen Downer (c) | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:32:31. [CVDB435611]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Currie, Brendan McCarthy, Stephen Downer
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Dannn, Judge Anderson, Judge Dredd, Judge McGivern, Judge Tarjay
ComicInfo.Teams: Judges of Mega-City One, Psi-Division, Special Judicial Squad
